name: Mars Buggy
overview: Mars Buggy is a clone of Moon Patrol developed by Vahid Azodi and published by Business Press International in Your Computer 1985/02. If you have not seen the game in the arcades here is a brief description. You control a buggy which can jump and fire bullets in horizontal and vertical directions. The game is played on a scrolling screen which scrolls from right to left you have three lives at the beginning of the game and one life is deducted every time you fall into a ditch or hit a rock or get hit by a bullet from the space ships. The object of the game is to stay alive as long as possible.
